.Valid Usage (Implicit)
****
* [[VUID-VkComputePipelineCreateInfo-sType-sType]] pname:sType must: be ename:VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_COMPUTE_PIPELINE_CREATE_INFO
* [[VUID-VkComputePipelineCreateInfo-pNext-pNext]] pname:pNext must: be `NULL`
* [[VUID-VkComputePipelineCreateInfo-flags-parameter]] pname:flags must: be a valid combination of elink:VkPipelineCreateFlagBits values
* [[VUID-VkComputePipelineCreateInfo-stage-parameter]] pname:stage must: be a valid sname:VkPipelineShaderStageCreateInfo structure
* [[VUID-VkComputePipelineCreateInfo-layout-parameter]] pname:layout must: be a valid sname:VkPipelineLayout handle
* [[VUID-VkComputePipelineCreateInfo-commonparent]] Both of pname:basePipelineHandle, and pname:layout that are valid handles must: have been created, allocated, or retrieved from the same sname:VkDevice
****
